about_the_game:
Sirene wakes up in a forest with few memories of how she ended up there. Her journey begins by trying to understand what is happening to her and soon having to fight for her survival. Help Sirene understand what is going on and escape this agony.

FIND MEMORIES


Prepare for the ultimate test on each map as Sirene seeks to collect elusive memory fragments. Each piece unravels the enigma, propelling you toward a breathtaking climax. Uncover the truth and face destiny head-on!

ACTION!


Experience super nice gameplay with user-friendly controls. Our non-linear design grants you the freedom to tackle challenges tailored to your experience. Dive in and conquer your way!
Mold your adventure with experience points distributed across three attributes: Damage, Agility, and Accuracy. As you level up, unlock game-changing perks to redefine your path!

ENEMY EVENTS


Engage in an intense experience as the enigmatic Black Shadows pursue you relentlessly. Once captured, brace yourself for a thrilling Enemy Event, unleashing waves of adversaries. Overcome the challenge, and a treasure chest awaits as your well-deserved reward.

Important

All enemy Event Areas have some parameters to define all the waves that will come, like that, every time the enemies' waves will be different on each pass.

SIDE QUESTS


In Veil of Shadows, captivating side quests await—some times optional but rewarding! Unlock intriguing, unique rewards by delving deeper into the adventure. Don't miss out on these hidden gems!

LOTS OF ENEMIES!


On your journey, you'll encounter obstacles to makes the journey more interesting and, sometimes, to teach some mechanics. Each challenge sparks curiosity, leaving you eagerly wondering, "What's next?"

Don't forget to WISHLIST now!


Veil of Shadows is more than a game; it's an immersive odyssey that will captivate your senses and test your courage. Are you prepared to uncover the truth lurking in the shadows?

short_description: Veil of Shadows is an action-adventure with roguelite elements, echoing the vibes of classics from the past. Explore the surroundings to understand what's happening to Sirene. With the essence of retro games, face monsters, complete quests to gain experience, and evolve, preparing for the journey.
